overview: The popular Munich crime scene duo Nemec and Wachtveitl give absolutely nothing in this comedic treat.Lothar likes his life as a commercial photographer. His best friend Milan flies around the world as a co-pilot. Everything is fine until Lothar starts an affair with Milan's daughter and Milan consoles himself with Lothar's girlfriend. From now on it's all fun. The harmonious coexistence in two semi-detached houses becomes a make or break fight.
title: Die Copiloten
